item.title: Pruning science
item.author: Kaushalya Jagodage,
item.description: The Biology and Biochemistry Departments are currently undergoing a Restructure and in the next few months a ‘Departmental Teaching Review’ will follow. This Restructure involves the removal of the ‘Plants and Microbial Science’ and ‘Cell Biology and Genomics’ sections. These areas were chosen for …
